bibliographic-data.invention-title: Ranking of User-Generated Game Play Advice

abstract.p: Management of user-generated game play advice is disclosed. The present invention allows for management of game play advice that is complete and up-to-date regardless of when a particular interactive gaming title is released. Game play advice is pervasive and easily accessible to game players in addition to being accurate and credible such that game players can trust or rely upon the rendered advice.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Real time context display of classified game proposal generated by subscriber

abstract.p: The invention relates to a real time context display of classified game proposal generated by subscriber, a management of the game proposal with appropriate context generated by the subscriber is disclosed. The invention allows the game proposal with the appropriate context to be managed, the game proposal is intact and the newest game proposal has no need of considering that when the specific interactive game title is issued. Besides the game proposal is accurate and reliable to enable the game player to trust or depend on the proposal, the game proposal is spread over and is easy to access. The game proposal can be displayed in the context which is suitable for displaying the proposal.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Real-time, contextual display of ranked, user-generated game play advice
Kontextabhängige Echtzeitanzeige von eingestuften, benutzererstellten Videospiel-Ratschlägen
Affichage contextuel en temps réel de conseils classés de jeu généré par un utilisateur

abstract.p: Management of user-generated and context appropriate game play advice (510a-f, 610, 620) is disclosed. The present invention allows for management of context appropriate game play advice (510a-f, 610, 620) that is complete and up-to-date regardless of when a particular interactive gaming title is released. Game play advice (510a-f, 610, 620) is pervasive and easily accessible to game players in addition to being accurate and credible such that game players can trust or rely upon the rendered advice. The game play advice is displayed (270, 350, 470) in environmental contexts that are appropriate to the advice being displayed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Real-time, contextual display of ranked, user-generated game play advice
Kontextabhängige Echtzeitanzeige von eingestuften, benutzererstellten Videospiel-Ratschlägen
Affichage contextuel en temps réel de conseils classés de jeu généré par un utilisateur
REAL-TIME, CONTEXTUAL DISPLAY OF RANKED, USER-GENERATED GAME PLAY ADVICE

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To disclose management of user-generated and context-appropriate game play advice.

SOLUTION: The present invention allows for management of context-appropriate game play advice that is complete and up-to-date regardless of when a particular interactive gaming title is released. Game play advice is pervasive and easily accessible to game players in addition to being accurate and credible, such that game players can trust or rely upon the advice. The game play advice is displayed in environmental contexts that are appropriate to the advice being displayed.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: REAL-TIME, CONTEXTUAL DISPLAY OF RANKED, USER-GENERATED GAME PLAY ADVICE

abstract.p: PURPOSE: A real-time contextual display of a game play device is provided to offer game advice based on feedback data from a community. CONSTITUTION: A game play advice statement engine(110) receives a game play advice statements through a network. A ranking engine(130) assigns a rank to each received game play advice statement. A context engine(140) distinguishes the context of an event during game play. A game play advice display engine(150) displays game play advice statements. A feedback engine(160) receives a message about feedback toward the quality of the game play advice.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: REAL-TIME, CONTEXTUAL DISPLAY OF RANKED, USER-GENERATED GAME PLAY ADVICE
Real-Time, Contextual Display of Ranked, User-Generated Game Play Advice

abstract.p: Management of user-generated and context appropriate game play advice is disclosed. The present invention allows for management of context appropriate game play advice that is complete and up-to-date regardless of when a particular interactive gaming title is released. Game play advice is pervasive and easily accessible to game players in addition to being accurate and credible such that game players can trust or rely upon the rendered advice. The game play advice is displayed in environmental contexts that are appropriate to the advice being displayed.
